articles.title: The new space race to the moon's south pole - CNN
articles.description: Russia, India, the U.S. and China are all eyeing the south pole of the moon. Russia and India currently have missions preparing to make soft landings on this shadowy part of the lunar surface, that potentially contains water ice. CNN’s Michael Holmes reports.
